name: WarGround
description: 'Warground' is a turn-based strategy that aims to be casual. Use 26 units of 6 troops to win the battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX750 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 220 MB available space Sound Card: Built-in sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64-bit Processor: i5 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1050 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Built-in sound card
